steps: Coordinator will call you to discuss details
Say 'Hi' on WhatsApp and share your location (map)
Fill out the demo registration form and pay ₹500 as demo registration fee (subject to change and negotiable)
We will finalize the teacher's profile within 2-3 days and share it on WhatsApp
Review the profile and observe the demo class

parent_instructions: Be available for phone calls and text messages to assist tutors in locating the demo address. For online demos, be available at the right time to join the channel.
Prepare your child for the demo before the tutor's arrival. Have at least one parent present during the demo for observation.
Days, duration, and fees are managed by the Institute, not tutors. Direct queries about these to the coordinator after the demo.
Do not share contact numbers or addresses with tutors, nor inquire about personal details during the demo. This violates company policy and will result in class cancellation.
Maintain a conducive environment for tutors to conduct demos. Exhibit politeness and humility while discussing subject matter.
Provide constructive feedback after the demo session to ensure the tutoring experience aligns with expectations.
tutor_instructions: Arrive at least 10 minutes before the scheduled time
Maintain politeness, humility, and sincerity when interacting with parents
Craft a well-prepared introduction highlighting educational qualifications and professional experience
Maintain professional appearance during demos and classes
Do not share personal contact information or request such details from parents
Thoroughly prepare lessons before conducting demos
Direct parents to the coordinator for inquiries about schedule, fees, or location
Review location on map, subjects, fees, days, and time before the demo
student_flow: Sign up with email/phone or social login, provide basic details and learning preferences
Platform recommends prioritized list of tutors based on profile and preferences using recommendation system
Request a demo slot or paid session from recommended tutor
Attend 20-30 minute demo class using platform's video, chat, and whiteboard tools
Rate the session and give feedback after demo
Select tutor based on recommendations, demo outcomes, and ratings
Complete payment securely through the platform to unlock sessions or packages
tutor_flow: Sign up and complete profile with qualifications, subjects, hourly rate, availability, bio, and sample resources
Platform recommends potential students matching expertise and availability
Accept or propose times for demo requests and paid sessions
Conduct 20-30 minute demo sessions showcasing teaching style and clarifying expectations
Wait for student's decision and feedback after demo
Begin scheduled classes once student finalizes and payment is processed

faq.question: How do I book a demo?
faq.answer: Contact our coordinator who will call you to discuss details. Say 'Hi' on WhatsApp, share your location, fill the demo registration form, and pay ₹500 demo fee. We'll finalize a teacher profile within 2-3 days and share it with you.

faq.question: What if I need to change my tutor?
faq.answer: We provide tutor security. If a tutor leaves for any emergency or you want a change, a new tutor will be appointed within 2 weeks. It's the institute's responsibility to find a replacement.

faq.question: How does matching work?
faq.answer: We use a recommendation system that considers subject/topic, learning goals, availability, budget, past ratings/reviews, demo outcomes, and engagement signals to match tutors and students.

faq.question: What boards do you support?
faq.answer: We support ICSE, IGCSE, CBSE, IB, and A-Level educational boards with both online and offline tutoring options.

faq.question: What happens after the demo?
faq.answer: After the demo, provide feedback and rate the session. If satisfied, finalize the teacher by paying fees for 1, 3, or 6 months. The tutor will then begin scheduled classes.

faq.question: Do you provide study materials?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide complete study support including notes, worksheets, test papers, e-books, video lectures, and interactive quizzes through our digital resource library.

faq.question: What is the group tuition size?
faq.answer: Our group tuition maintains small batches of 3-5 students per teacher to ensure personalized attention while fostering peer learning.

faq.question: How do you track student progress?
faq.answer: We provide monthly progress reports with detailed summaries of performance, areas of strength, and improvement plans. We also have regular homework, practice tests, and interactive doubt-clearing sessions.
